hero.heading: A <1>unique</1> approach to learning foreign languages online
hero.description: Learn at your own pace, with lifetime access on mobile and desktop

value.subtitle: Why choose us
value.heading: Our values
value.valueDescriptionOne: In our school you will practice your speaking skills and just get a lot of positive emotions!
value.valueDescriptionTwo: A huge work has been done with the teachers and their work has been monitored thoroughly.
value.valueDescriptionThree: The CEF of Reference has been used at our school.It allows to control our students success in studying.

testimonials.name: Martin Watson
testimonials.quote: There is no way I could have made the same progress learning Spanish without using Lingua. The best part is now learning Spanish has become one of my biggest hobbies.There is no way I could have made the same progress learning Spanish without using Lingua.
